pullRequest.title: core: copy the SchemaDescriptor when rebuilding descriptor
pullRequest.bodyText: useMarshalledMessages works by duplicating a ServerServiceDefinition while replacing just the marshallers. It currently does not copy over the SchemaDescriptors, which breaks at least the ProtoReflectionService.

nodes.bodyText: wrappedMethods is never used, and this is causing the CI error.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -187,13 +187,15 @@ public InputStream parse(final InputStream stream) {
       wrappedMethods.add(wrapMethod(definition, wrappedMethodDescriptor));

commit.message:
core: copy the SchemaDescriptor when rebuilding descriptor

useMarshalledMessages works by duplicating a ServerServiceDefinition while replacing just the marshallers. It currently does not copy over the SchemaDescriptors, which breaks at least the ProtoReflectionService.
